Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith

Rank: 20


As the Clone Wars nears its end- Obi-Wan Kenobi pursues a new threat- while Anakin Skywalker is lured by Chancellor Palpatine into a sinister plot for galactic domination.


Director: George Lucas

Writer: George Lucas

Stars: Hayden Christensen, Natalie Portman, Ewan McGregor

Tags: Action Epic, Adventure Epic, Dark Fantasy, Epic, Fantasy Epic, Sci,Fi Epic, Space Sci,Fi, Tragedy, Action, Adventure
